description: This header file defines a mock class 'Store2NotificationMock' for the interface 'WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::INotification' used in unit testing. It includes mocking of the 'ValueChanged' method and interface mapping macros.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the 'INotification' interface for unit testing purposes.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: A mock method to simulate the ValueChanged event, handling scope, namespace, key, and value parameters.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
